name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Man of Steel
name_original: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Man of Steel
description:
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Man of Steel is an arcade game. It was originally released in 2014. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Man of Steel is available on PC.
